snippet: MIGDAL--Lester, who died this past Memorial Day, at 98, is lovingly remembered by eight special friends who met with him biweekly since the 1970's. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MIGDAL--Lester, who died this past Memorial Day, at 98, is lovingly remembered by eight special friends who met with him biweekly since the 1970's. 1/3
